thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Mike Lightfoot
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Mike Lightfoot

author: Mike Lightfoot
title: Mike Lightfoot
text:
Wife and I hired an older car (2003 Sunny) Spotlessly clean and did the job nicely. Represented top value for money. Service was fantastic with no hidden pitfalls. Airport pick-up and drop-off was quick. These people must be double jointed, they must be because they all bent over backwards to make our great holiday even better. Thanks guys.
Mike and Janice. L. Qld.
